      • blockConnection

        public void blockConnection(Map<String,Object> params,
                   ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Moves or removes an account into the user's blocked group.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/block

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.accountIdBeingBlocked
          the id of the account to be blocked/unblocked
        • SirqulKeys.blockFlagValue
          determines whether the account is blocked or unblocked
        • SirqulKeys.removeFromGroupsIfBlocked
          determines whether the account is removed from all other groups if blocked
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the current location of the user
        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.blockConnection

      • createAccount

        public void createAccount(Map<String,Object> params,
                 ISirqulCallback<AccountLoginResponse> callback)
        Creates an account.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/create

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.name
          The full name of the user. If this parameter is not empty, the following parameters will be ignored: prefixName, firstName, middleName, lastName, and suffixName
        • SirqulKeys.prefixName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the prefix of the user's name
        • SirqulKeys.firstName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the user's first name
        • SirqulKeys.middleName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the user's middle name
        • SirqulKeys.lastName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the user's last name
        • SirqulKeys.suffixName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the suffix of the user's name
        • SirqulKeys.title
          this field will be used to set the user's job title
        • SirqulKeys.username
          the encrypted email of the user, this is what will be used when they login
        • SirqulKeys.password
          the encrypted password of the user
        • SirqulKeys.assetId
          the asset id to set the user's profile image
        • SirqulKeys.streetAddress
          the street address of the user's contact location
        • SirqulKeys.zipcode
          the street zipcode of the user's contact location
        • SirqulKeys.gender
          the gender
        • SirqulKeys.birthday
          the birthday
        • SirqulKeys.homePhone
          the home phone
        • SirqulKeys.cellPhone
          the cell phone
        • SirqulKeys.cellPhoneCarrier
          the cell phone carrier
        • SirqulKeys.businessPhone
          the business phone
        • SirqulKeys.role
          the type of account being created {RETAILER, MEMBER, DEVELOPER, GUEST}
        • SirqulKeys.platforms
          list of development platforms {MAC, WINDOWS, IOS, ANDROID, WINDOWSPHONE, KINDLE, UNITY3D, COCOS2D, HTML5, FACEBOOK}
        • SirqulKeys.tags
          list of search tags
        • SirqulKeys.gameExperience
          game experience level of the user {ANY, NEW, BEGINNER, INTERMEDIATE, EXPERT}
        • SirqulKeys.hometown
          the user's hometown
        • SirqulKeys.height
          the user's height
        • SirqulKeys.heightIndex
          the user's height in a numerical value that can be used for ordering/searching
        • SirqulKeys.ethnicity
          the user's ethnicity
        • SirqulKeys.bodyType
          the user's body type
        • SirqulKeys.maritalStatus
          the user's maritial status
        • SirqulKeys.children
          the user's children status
        • SirqulKeys.religion
          the user's religion
        • SirqulKeys.education
          the user's education
        • SirqulKeys.educationIndex
          the user's education in a numerical value that can be used for ordering/searching
        • SirqulKeys.smoke
          the user's smoke status
        • SirqulKeys.drink
          the user's drink status
        • SirqulKeys.companionship
          the user's companionship status
        • SirqulKeys.companionshipIndex
          the user's companionship index
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMinAge
          the preferred minimum age in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMaxAge
          the preferred maximum age in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMinHeight
          the preferred minimum height in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMaxHeight
          the preferred maximum height in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredGender
          the preferred gender in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredEducation
          the preferred education in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredEducationIndex
          the preferred education in a numerical value that can be used for ordering/searching
        • SirqulKeys.preferredBodyType
          the preferred body type in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredEthnicity
          the preferred ethnicity in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredLocation
          the preferred education in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredLocationRange
          the preferred location range in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the current location of the user
        • SirqulKeys.acceptedTerms
          if the user has accepted the terms of service
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key. A unique id of the app. Maps to "gameType".
        • SirqulKeys.appVersion of type AppVersion
          the version of the application. AppVersion
        • SirqulKeys.responseType
          the response type, use "AccountResponse" for AccountLoginResponse . Otherwise, SirqulResponse.
        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        the AccountLoginResponse
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.createAccount

      • getAccount

        public void getAccount(Map<String,Object> params,
              ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Gets the account.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/get

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.username
          the user's email address they used to sign-up
        • SirqulKeys.password
          the password
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the current location of the user
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key for which the user is logging in to. Maps to "gameType" in call.
        • SirqulKeys.returnProfile
          determines whether to return a ProfileResponse on success, or a PaymentTypesResponse. Default is false.
        • SirqulKeys.responseFilters
          if returnProfile is set to true, this determines how much of the profile should be returned, see Enums.ProfileFilters

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        if returnProfile is true, a ProfileResponse on valid response, else if false, a PaymentTypesResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse on an invalid response with error message
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.getAccount

      • getProfile

        public void getProfile(Map<String,Object> params,
              ISirqulCallback<ProfileResponse> callback)
        Gets the profile.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/profile/get

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.connectionAccountId
          the account id used to view another person's account
        • SirqulKeys.responseFilters
          a comma separated list of Enums.ProfileFilters for filtering the returned response data
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        • SirqulKeys.purchaseType
          the purchase type
        • SirqulKeys.updateViewedDate
          determines whether to track if a person has viewed someone's profile
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the location used to update the user's current location

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a ProfileResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.getProfile

      • getProfileAssets

        public void getProfileAssets(Map<String,Object> params,
                    ISirqulCallback<AssetListResponse> callback)
        Get a list of assets a person has ever uploaded. Filters the list based on parameters.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/profile/assets

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.ownerId
          the account id of the person the user wants to view
        • SirqulKeys.mediaTypes
          comma separated list of Enums.MediaType
        • SirqulKeys.mimeTypes
          comma separated list of mime types
        • SirqulKeys.sortField
          determines what the returning list will be sorted by (see Enums.AssetApiMap)
        • SirqulKeys.descending
          determines whether to return the resulting list in descending or ascending order
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the location
        • SirqulKeys.start
          the start of the pagination
        • SirqulKeys.limit
          the limit of the pagination

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a AssetListResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.getProfileAssets

      • loginSecure

        public void loginSecure(Map<String,Object> params,
               ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Login with encrypted user-name and password.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/login/validate

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.username
          the user's encrypted email address they used to sign-up
        • SirqulKeys.password
          the encrypted password
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        • SirqulKeys.charsetName
          the charset name used. Default is UTF-8.
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the current location of the user
        • SirqulKeys.returnProfile
          determines whether to return a ProfileResponse on success, or a PaymentTypesResponse. Default is false.
        • SirqulKeys.responseFilters
          if returnProfile is set to true, this determines how much of the profile should be returned, see Enums.ProfileFilters

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        if returnProfile is true, a ProfileResponse on valid response, else if false, a PaymentTypesResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse on an invalid response with error message
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.loginSecure

      • passwordChange

        public void passwordChange(Map<String,Object> params,
                  ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Update the account password.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/passwordchange

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id
        • SirqulKeys.oldPassword
          The current password, used to validate access
        • SirqulKeys.newPassword
          The new password to set, cannot be empty
        • SirqulKeys.confirmPassword
          The new password to confirm, must match newPassword

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.passwordChange

      • passwordReset

        public void passwordReset(Map<String,Object> params,
                 ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Reset the account password. The token must be valid and not expired. Use the passwordResetRequest(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object>, com.sirqul.sdk.interfaces.ISirqulCallback<com.sirqul.sdk.responses.SirqulResponse>) end point to request a token.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/passwordreset

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.token
          The token associated with the account to update, good for 24 hours
        • SirqulKeys.password
          The new password to set, cannot be empty
        • SirqulKeys.confirmPassword
          The new password to confirm, must match newPassword

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.passwordReset

      • passwordResetRequest

        public void passwordResetRequest(Map<String,Object> params,
                        ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Request that an account password be reset. The account is looked up by email address and then a link is sent via email to that account with a reset token. The token is valid for 24 hours.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/requestpasswordreset

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.email
          email the email/username of the account
        • SirqulKeys.referer
          Default: http://www.sirqul .com/passwordreset

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.passwordResetRequest

      • searchConnectionsByRangeAndName

        public void searchConnectionsByRangeAndName(Map<String,Object> params,
                                   ISirqulCallback<UserLocationSearchResponse> callback)
        Search accounts by their location. This only searches on users that have location data. Use searchConnectionsByName to perform a regular search on accounts.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/search

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.filters
          list of Enums.ConnectionApiMap, to filter results
        • SirqulKeys.keyword
          an optional keyword to search on, will be ignore if empty (NOT implemented yet)
        • SirqulKeys.postalCode
          the postal code to search on, either postalCode or the user's exact location is required
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the location of the user, either postalCode or the user's exact location is required
        • SirqulKeys.range
          the range to search on
        • SirqulKeys.locationLastUpdated
          searches for user's that has updated their location since this date
        • SirqulKeys.gender
          the preferred gender
        • SirqulKeys.minAge
          the preferred min age
        • SirqulKeys.maxAge
          the preferred max age
        • SirqulKeys.companionshipIndex
          the preferred companionship index
        • SirqulKeys.start
          the start index of the pagination
        • SirqulKeys.limit
          the limit of the pagination
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        • SirqulKeys.updateCurrentLocation
          whether to use the given lat & long to update the user's current location
        • SirqulKeys.updatePreferredSettings
          whether to use the given parameters to update the user's preferred settings

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a UserLocationSearchResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.searchConnectionsByRangeAndName

      • secureSignup

        public void secureSignup(Map<String,Object> params,
                ISirqulCallback<ProfileInfoResponse> callback)
        Create a new account by role (with encrypted user-name and password).

        Target API Endpoint: /account/create/validate

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.name
          The full name of the user. If this parameter is not empty, the following parameters will be ignored: prefixName, firstName, middleName, lastName, and suffixName
        • SirqulKeys.prefixName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the prefix of the user's name
        • SirqulKeys.firstName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the user's first name
        • SirqulKeys.middleName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the user's middle name
        • SirqulKeys.lastName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the user's last name
        • SirqulKeys.suffixName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the suffix of the user's name
        • SirqulKeys.title
          the title
        • SirqulKeys.username
          the encrypted email of the user, this is what will be used when they login
        • SirqulKeys.password
          the encrypted password of the user
        • SirqulKeys.assetId
          the asset id to set the user's profile image
        • SirqulKeys.address
          the address
        • SirqulKeys.zipcode
          the street zipcode of the user's contact location
        • SirqulKeys.gender
          the gender of the user Enums.AudienceGender
        • SirqulKeys.birthday
          the birthday date of the user in milliseconds
        • SirqulKeys.homePhone
          the home phone
        • SirqulKeys.cellPhone
          the cell phone
        • SirqulKeys.cellPhoneCarrier
          the cell phone carrier
        • SirqulKeys.businessPhone
          the business phone
        • SirqulKeys.role
          the type of account being created {RETAILER, MEMBER, DEVELOPER, GUEST}
        • SirqulKeys.platforms
          comma separated list of development platforms {MAC, WINDOWS, IOS, ANDROID, WINDOWSPHONE, KINDLE, UNITY3D, COCOS2D, HTML5, FACEBOOK}
        • SirqulKeys.tags
          search tags
        • SirqulKeys.gameExperience
          game experience level of the user {ANY, NEW, BEGINNER, INTERMEDIATE, EXPERT}
        • SirqulKeys.hometown
          the user's hometown
        • SirqulKeys.height
          the user's height
        • SirqulKeys.heightIndex
          the user's height in a numerical value that can be used for ordering/searching
        • SirqulKeys.ethnicity
          the user's ethnicity
        • SirqulKeys.bodyType
          the user's body type
        • SirqulKeys.maritalStatus
          the user's maritial status
        • SirqulKeys.children
          the user's children status
        • SirqulKeys.religion
          the user's religion
        • SirqulKeys.education
          the user's education
        • SirqulKeys.educationIndex
          the user's education in a numerical value that can be used for ordering/searching
        • SirqulKeys.smoke
          the user's smoke status
        • SirqulKeys.drink
          the user's drink status
        • SirqulKeys.companionship
          the user's companionship status
        • SirqulKeys.companionshipIndex
          the user's companionship index
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMinAge
          the preferred minimum age in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMaxAge
          the preferred maximum age in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMinHeight
          the preferred minimum height in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMaxHeight
          the preferred maximum height in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredGender
          the preferred gender in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredEducation
          the preferred education in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredEducationIndex
          the preferred education in a numerical value that can be used for ordering/searching
        • SirqulKeys.preferredBodyType
          the preferred body type in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredEthnicity
          the preferred ethnicity in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredLocation
          the preferred education in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredLocationRange
          the preferred location range in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the location of the user
        • SirqulKeys.acceptedTerms
          the accepted terms
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the app key
        • SirqulKeys.appVersion of type AppVersion
          the app version
        • SirqulKeys.responseType
          the response type

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        ProfileInfoResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.secureSignup

      • updateAccount

        public void updateAccount(Map<String,Object> params,
                 ISirqulCallback<ProfileInfoResponse> callback)
        Edit the user's profile information

        Target API Endpoint: /account/profile/update

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.assetId
          the asset id
        • SirqulKeys.name
          The full name of the user. If this parameter is NOT empty, the following parameters will be ignored: prefixName, firstName, middleName, lastName, and suffixName
        • SirqulKeys.prefixName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the prefix of the user's name
        • SirqulKeys.firstName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the user's first name
        • SirqulKeys.middleName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the user's middle name
        • SirqulKeys.lastName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the user's last name
        • SirqulKeys.suffixName
          if the parameter 'name' is empty or not present, this field will be used to set the suffix of the user's name
        • SirqulKeys.title
          this field will be used to set the user's job title
        • SirqulKeys.gender
          the gender of the user Enums.AudienceGender
        • SirqulKeys.age
          This is deprecated, use the birthday parameter
        • SirqulKeys.birthday
          the birthday date of the user in milliseconds
        • SirqulKeys.homePhone
          the home phone number
        • SirqulKeys.cellPhone
          the cellular phone number
        • SirqulKeys.cellPhoneCarrier
          the cellular service provider
        • SirqulKeys.businessPhone
          the business phone number
        • SirqulKeys.emailAddress
          the user's contact email address (NOT the username)
        • SirqulKeys.streetAddress
          the street address of the user's contact location
        • SirqulKeys.streetAddress2
          additional address information (such as a suite number, floor number, building name, or PO Box)
        • SirqulKeys.city
          the city of the user's contact location
        • SirqulKeys.state
          the state of the user's contact location
        • SirqulKeys.zipcode
          the zipcode of the user's contact location
        • SirqulKeys.country
          the country of the user's contact location
        • SirqulKeys.makeProfileInfoPublic
          allow anyone to view the user's personal profile
        • SirqulKeys.makeGameInfoPublic
          allow anyone to view the user's game/app info
        • SirqulKeys.makeFriendsInfoPublic
          allow anyone to view the user's friends list
        • SirqulKeys.hometown
          the user's hometown
        • SirqulKeys.height
          the user's height
        • SirqulKeys.heightIndex
          the user's height in a numerical value that can be used for ordering/searching
        • SirqulKeys.ethnicity
          the user's ethnicity
        • SirqulKeys.bodyType
          the user's body type
        • SirqulKeys.maritalStatus
          the user's marital status
        • SirqulKeys.children
          the user's children status
        • SirqulKeys.religion
          the user's religion
        • SirqulKeys.education
          the user's education
        • SirqulKeys.educationIndex
          the user's education in a numerical value that can be used for ordering/searching
        • SirqulKeys.smoke
          the user's smoke status
        • SirqulKeys.drink
          the user's drink status
        • SirqulKeys.companionship
          the user's companionship status
        • SirqulKeys.companionshipIndex
          the user's companionship index
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMinAge
          the preferred minimum age in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMaxAge
          the preferred maximum age in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMinHeight
          the preferred minimum height in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredMaxHeight
          the preferred maximum height in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredGender
          the preferred gender in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredEducation
          the preferred education in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredEducationIndex
          the preferred education in a numerical value that can be used for ordering/searching
        • SirqulKeys.preferredBodyType
          the preferred body type in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredEthnicity
          the preferred ethnicity in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredLocation
          the preferred education in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.preferredLocationRange
          the preferred location range in the account location search
        • SirqulKeys.platforms
          the platforms
        • SirqulKeys.tags
          the tags
        • SirqulKeys.matchToken
          the match token
        • SirqulKeys.categories
          a list of categories ids containing the the user's interests
        • SirqulKeys.responseFilters
          a list of Enums.ProfileFilters for filtering the returned response data
        • SirqulKeys.showAsZipcode
          the user's preference if they want to be shown by zipcode on a map
        • SirqulKeys.showExactLocation
          the user's preference if they want to be shown by their exact location on a map
        • SirqulKeys.showOthersExactLocation
          the user's preference if they want to see others exact location on a map
        • SirqulKeys.acceptedTerms
          the accepted terms
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the current location of the user

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a ProfileInfoResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.updateAccount

      • updateLocation

      • updateSettings

        public void updateSettings(Map<String,Object> params,
                  ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Update settings.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/settings/update

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          The account id of the user
        • SirqulKeys.blockedNotifications
          The notifications to be blocked
        • SirqulKeys.suggestionMethod
          How suggestions are to be sent (APNS, MOBILE_NOTIFICATION, SMS)
        • SirqulKeys.suggestionCount
          How many suggestions to receive per time frame
        • SirqulKeys.suggestionTimeFrame
          The time frame in seconds, 3600 would be a 1 hour time frame
        • SirqulKeys.showExactLocation
          the show exact location
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the current location of the user

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.updateSettings

      • validateAccountSignup

        public void validateAccountSignup(Map<String,Object> params,
                         ISirqulCallback<AccountLoginResponse> callback)
        Validate the password reset token. The token must be valid and not expired. Use the passwordResetRequest(Map, ISirqulCallback) end point to request a token. The user receives and email with the reset page, therefore it should be validated before bwing used to reset the password.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/validateAccountSignup

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.token
          The token associated with the account to update, good for 24 hours

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of fail or AccountLoginResponse on success.
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.validateAccountSignup

      • validatePasswordReset

        public void validatePasswordReset(Map<String,Object> params,
                         ISirqulCallback<AccountLoginResponse> callback)
        Validate the password reset token. The token must be valid and not expired. Use the passwordResetRequest(Map, ISirqulCallback) end point to request a token. The user receives and email with the reset page, therefore it should be validated before bwing used to reset the password.

        Target API Endpoint: /account/validatepasswordresset

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.token
          The token associated with the account to update, good for 24 hours

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of fail or AccountLoginResponse on success.
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.validatePasswordReset

      • validateSubscription

        public void validateSubscription(Map<String,Object> params,
                        ISirqulCallback<ProfileResponse> callback)
        Checks to see if a user still has premium access.

        Target API Endpoint: /subscription/validate

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the current location of the user
        • SirqulKeys.responseFilters
          a list of Enums.ProfileFilters for filtering the returned response data

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        ProfileResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AccountObject.validateSubscription
